scripts.setup: mkdir src && mkdir src/js src/scss && touch src/index.html src/js/index.js src/scss/main.scss .gitignore webpack.config.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar ./src/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
